name: 吳昭正
objective: 布林代數與邏輯閘，組合邏輯，算術演算邏輯，同步循序邏輯，演繹狀態機，非同步循序邏輯。
schedule:
Week 1(9/9、11). Introduction 
Week 2(9/16、18). Number systems、Holiday
Week 3(9/23、25). Boolean Algebra (I) 
Week 4(9/30、10/2). Boolean Algebra (II) & Applications of Boolean algebra minterm and maxterm expansions (I)
Week 5(10/7、9). Holiday; Applications of Boolean algebra minterm and maxterm expansions (II)
Week 6(10/14、16). Karnaugh Maps (I)
Week 7(10/21、23). Karnaugh Maps (II)
Week 8(10/28、30). Quine-McClusky Method 
Week 9(11/6). Midterm Exam
Week 10(11/11、13). Leave for a conference
Week 11(11/18、20). Multi-Level Gate Circuits NAND and NOR Gates
Week 12(11/25、27). Combinational Circuit Design and Simulation Using Gates
Week 13(12/2、4). Multiplexers, Decoders, and Programmable Logic Devices
Week 14(12/9、11). Latches and Flip-Flops
Week 15(12/16、18). Registers and Counters
Week 16(12/23、25). State Machines (I)
Week 17(12/30、1/1). State Machines (II)
Week 18(1/8). Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Homework exams: 30%
